transArray.content: The front desk of the hotel is very welcoming, the service is very good, the breakfast is also very good, a very good stay experience

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for your affirmation and support! We do our best every time you have a meal. We hope to bring you the best dining experience. We are always on the way to quality! All the hotel staff wish you a happy life and smooth work, and look forward to your visit again! General Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
